languages.text: {n}Вы почему-то точно уверены — прямо сейчас вам в затылок упирается "взгляд" пустых глазниц трупа Зари. Откуда-то приходит мысль — не голос в голове, нет, просто мысль — "Они все умрут. Одурманенными, так и не узревшими Истины. И все — из-за тебя, враг мой".{/n}

{n}For whatever reason, you know for certain that right at this moment, the "gaze" of Aurora's dead, empty eye sockets is fixed upon the back of your head. A thought surfaces in your mind, not a voice inside your head, no, a mere thought: "They are all going to die. Befuddled, deprived, never having seen the Truth. And it is all because of you, enemy mine."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы почему-то точно уверены — прямо сейчас вам в затылок упирается "взгляд" пустых глазниц трупа Зари. Откуда-то приходит мысль — не голос в голове, нет, просто мысль — "Они все умрут. Одурманенными, так и не узревшими Истины. И все — из-за тебя, враг мой".{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}For whatever reason, you know for certain that right at this moment, the "gaze" of Aurora's dead, empty eye sockets is fixed upon the back of your head. A thought floats up — not a voice in your head, nothing like that, a mere thought: "They are all going to die. To die befuddled, never having seen the Truth. And it is all because of you, O enemy mine."{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aus irgendeinem Grund weißt du mit absoluter Sicherheit, dass gerade der "Blick" von Auroras toten, leeren Augenhöhlen auf deinen Hinterkopf gerichtet ist. Ein Gedanke steigt in deinem Verstand auf. Keine Stimme in deinem Kopf, nein, ein bloßer Gedanke: "Sie werden alle sterben. Verwirrt, benachteiligt, ohne je die Wahrheit gesehen zu haben. Und das alles nur Euretwegen, o {mf|mein Feind|meine Feindin}."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For whatever reason, you know for certain that right at this moment, the "gaze" of Aurora's dead, empty eye sockets is fixed upon the back of your head. A thought surfaces in your mind, not a voice inside your head, no, a mere thought: "They are all going to die. Befuddled, deprived, never having seen the Truth. And it is all because of you, enemy mine."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aus irgendeinem Grund weißt du mit absoluter Sicherheit, gerade der "Blick" von Auroras toten, leeren Augenhöhlen auf deinen Hinterkopf gerichtet ist. Ein Gedanke steigt in deinem Verstand auf. Keine Stimme in deinem Kopf, nein, ein bloßer Gedanke: "Sie werden alle sterben. Verwirrt, benachteiligt, ohne je die Wahrheit gesehen zu haben. Und das alles nur Euretwegen, o {mf|mein Feind|meine Feindin}."{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pour une raison qui vous échappe, vous savez avec certitude qu'en ce moment même, le « regard » mort des orbites vides d'Aurore fixe l'arrière de votre crâne. Une pensée surgit dans votre esprit. Pas une voix à l'intérieur de votre tête, non, une simple pensée : « Ils vont tous mourir. Confus, démunis, sans avoir jamais vu la Vérité. Et tout cela à cause de vous, mon {mf|ennemi|ennemie}. »{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For whatever reason, you know for certain that right at this moment, the "gaze" of Aurora's dead, empty eye sockets is fixed upon the back of your head. A thought surfaces in your mind, not a voice inside your head, no, a mere thought: "They are all going to die. Befuddled, deprived, never having seen the Truth. And it is all because of you, enemy mine."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pour une raison qui vous échappe, vous savez avec certitude qu'en ce moment même, le « regard » mort des orbites vides d'Aurore fixe l'arrière de votre crâne. Une pensée surgit dans votre esprit. Pas une voix à l'intérieur de votre tête, non, une simple pensée : « Ils vont tous mourir. Confus, démunis, sans avoir jamais vu la Vérité. Et tout cela à cause de vous, ô mon {mf|ennemi|ennemie}. »{/n}

languages.text: {n}不知道出于什么原因，你无比真实地感觉到，此时此刻，‘极光’尸体的空洞眼窝正凝视着你的后脑勺。这个可怕的想法——甚至不是某种声音，而就是切切实实的想法本身，浮现在你的脑海里。“他们都要死了，在茫然无措中死去，未能有幸见证真理。噢，我的仇敌，这一切都是你的错。”{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For whatever reason, you know for certain that right at this moment, the "gaze" of Aurora's dead, empty eye sockets is fixed upon the back of your head. A thought surfaces in your mind, not a voice inside your head, no, a mere thought: "They are all going to die. Befuddled, deprived, never having seen the Truth. And it is all because of you, enemy mine."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}不知道出于什么原因，你无比真实地感觉到，此时此刻，‘极光’尸体的空洞眼窝正凝视着你的后脑勺。这个可怕的想法——甚至不是某种声音，而就是切切实实的想法本身，浮现在你的脑海里。“他们都要死了，在茫然无措中死去，未能有幸见证真理。噢，我的仇敌，这一切都是你的错。”{/n}

languages.text: {n}どういうわけか、今この瞬間、確かに死んだオーロラの空っぽの眼窩から注がれる「視線」が自分の後頭部に張り付いていることが分かった。頭に思考が浮かぶ。頭の中の声じゃない、そう、ただの思考だ。「皆死ぬ。混乱、略奪、真実を一度も見ることはない。全てお前のせいだ、我が敵よ」{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For whatever reason, you know for certain that right at this moment, the "gaze" of Aurora's dead, empty eye sockets is fixed upon the back of your head. A thought surfaces in your mind, not a voice inside your head, no, a mere thought: "They are all going to die. Befuddled, deprived, never having seen the Truth. And it is all because of you, enemy mine."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}どういうわけか、今この瞬間、確かに死んだオーロラの空っぽの眼窩から注がれる「視線」が自分の後頭部に張り付いていることが分かった。頭に思考が浮かぶ。頭の中の声じゃない、そう、ただの思考だ。「皆死ぬ。混乱、略奪、真実を一度も見ることはない。全てお前のせいだ、我が敵よ」 {/n}

languages.text: {n}Por la razón que sea, sabes con certeza que justo en este momento, la «mirada» de las cuencas de los ojos muertos y vacíos de Aurora está fija en tu nuca. Un pensamiento aflora en tu mente, no una voz dentro de tu cabeza, no, un simple pensamiento: «Van a morir todos. Desconcertados, desamparados, sin haber visto nunca la Verdad. Y todo es por tu culpa, enemig{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For whatever reason, you know for certain that right at this moment, the "gaze" of Aurora's dead, empty eye sockets is fixed upon the back of your head. A thought surfaces in your mind, not a voice inside your head, no, a mere thought: "They are all going to die. Befuddled, deprived, never having seen the Truth. And it is all because of you, enemy mine."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por la razón que sea, sabes con certeza que justo en este momento, la «mirada» de las cuencas de los ojos muertos y vacíos de Aurora está fija en tu nuca. Un pensamiento aflora en tu mente, no una voz dentro de tu cabeza, no, un simple pensamiento: «Van a morir todos. Desconcertados, desamparados, sin haber visto nunca la Verdad. Y todo es por tu culpa, oh, enemig{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}».{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tuhaftır ki tam o anda Aurora'nın cansız bedenindeki boş göz çukurlarının bakışlarını kafanın arkasında hissediyorsun. Zihninde bir düşünce su yüzüne çıkıyor: "Hepsi ölecek. Şaşkın ve mahrum bırakılmış bir hâlde, Hakikat'e tanıklık edemeden. Hepsi de senin yüzünden düşmanım."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For whatever reason, you know for certain that right at this moment, the "gaze" of Aurora's dead, empty eye sockets is fixed upon the back of your head. A thought surfaces in your mind, not a voice inside your head, no, a mere thought: "They are all going to die. Befuddled, deprived, never having seen the Truth. And it is all because of you, enemy mine."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tuhaftır ki o anda Aurora'nın cansız bedenindeki boş göz çukurlarının bakışlarını kafanın arkasında hissedebiliyorsun. Zihninde bir düşünce beliriveriyor: "Hepsi ölecek. Sersem ve âciz bir surette, Hakikat'e şahitlik etmeden. Hepsi de senin, yegâne düşmanım yüzünden."{/n}
